title: HELP my riot points wont redeem
body:
I bought a $25 gift card, in preparation fro the christmas skins, and i tried to redeem it today to get the extra RP from the bonus RP event that ends today, but it says the code on it has been redeemed already, but that cant be right because i just scratched off the scratchy bit like 5 minutes ago.
what is going on? is there any way you can help me riot, i don't want to miss out on the bonus RP :(

my summoner name is Itachi Uchiha 
so if you want you can check my purchase history so you know i haven't redeemed it already and am just trying to score more points.

replies.body: Send a support ticket in mate hopefully they can get it sorted for you quickly =D

Yeah shoot a support ticket in and see what they can do. That would be your best bet at getting it sorted, plus if there was an error, the ticket will be time stamped in the bonus RP period so fingers crossed they can sort you out with that as well!
